content: Or were they created by nothing, or are they their own creators?
O mankind, worship your Lord, who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ

content: Part of the perfection of one's Islam is his leaving that which does not concern him.
The hijrah to Allah includes abandoning what He hates and doing what He loves and accepts.
Një namaz në këtë xhaminë time është më i vlefshëm sesa një mijë namaze jashtë saj, përveç në Xhaminë e Qabesë.
Krejt titujt në këtë botë me ti dhënë nuk vlejnë sa titulli që ta ka dhënë Allahu që je Musliman.
Ti bën durim në vendimin e Zotit tënd, se ti je nën mbikëqyrjen Tonë.
None of you will have faith till he loves me more than his father, his children and all mankind.
If a woman puts on perfume and passes by people so that they can smell her fragrance, then she is such and such, and he spoke sternly meaning an adulteress.
I seek the forgiveness of Allah and repent to Him one hundred times each day.
While a man was on the way, he found a thorny branch of a tree on the way and removed it. Allah thanked him for that deed and forgave him (his sins).
None of you will have faith till he loves me more than his father, his children, and all mankind.
Part of the perfection of one's Islam is his leaving that which does not concern him.
Beware of suspicion, for suspicion is the falsest of speech.
Whoever protects his brothers honor, Allah protects his face from the Fire on the Day of Resurrection.

Do not cut off one another, nor desert one another, nor hate one another, nor envy one another. Be you, O worshippers of Allah, brothers. It is not lawful for the Muslim to shun his brother for more than three (days).
Allah will not look, on the Day of Resurrection, at a person who drags his Izar (behind him) out of pride and arrogance.
If you were to rely upon Allah with the reliance He is due, you would be given provision like the birds: They go out hungry in the morning and come back with full bellies in the evening.
He who performed ablution well, his sins would come out from his body, even coming out from under his nails.
Whoever fasts Ramadan and follows it with six days of Shawwaal, it will be as if he fasted for a lifetime.
The strong man is not the one who can wrestle, but it is the one who can control himself when he is angry.
No one is humble for the sake of Allah, but Allah will raise him in status.
Whoever fasts Ramadan and follows it with six days of Shawwaal, it will be as if he fasted for a lifetime.
The strong man is not the one who can wrestle, but it is the one who can control himself when he is angry.
Beware of suspicion, for suspicion is the falsest of speech.
He who asks Allah for martyrdom, Allah will raise him to the high status of the martyrs, even if he dies on his bed.
The most hated person in the sight of Allah, is the most quarrelsome person.
Whoever guides others to do good will have a reward like that of the person who does the good deed.
When Allah wishes good for someone, He bestows upon him the understanding of Deen.
A true believer does not taunt or curse or abuse or talk indecently.
He who makes peace between the people by inventing good information or saying good things, is not a liar.
Whoever harms (others), Allah will harm him, and whoever causes hardship (to others) Allah will cause hardship to him.
If you hear that it (the plague) is in a land, do not go there, and if it breaks out in a land where you are, do not leave, fleeing from it.
Have taqwa (fear) of Allah wherever you may be, and follow up a bad deed with a good deed which will wipe it out, and behave well towards the people.
Whoever prayed at night in it (the month of Ramadan) out of sincere Faith and hoping for a reward from Allah, then all his previous sins will be forgiven.
Aisha, verily Allah is kind and He loves kindness and confers upon kindness which he does not confer upon severity and does not confer upon anything else besides it (kindness).
Do not argue with your brother, do not joke excessively with him, do not make a promise to him then break it
If a man loves his brother, let him tell him that he loves him.
Piety is good manner, and sin is that which creates doubt and you do not like people to know of it.
Being honorable is wealth and noble character is piety.
Charity does not decrease wealth.
I have only been sent to perfect good characteristics.
A good word is sadaqah. also A good deed is sadaqah.
The person who goes about with calumnies will never enter Jannah.
The blood, honour and property of a Muslim is inviolable for another Muslim.
He who believes in Allah and the Last Day must either speak good or remain silent.
Whoever prays the two cool prayers (Asr and Fajr) will go to Paradise.
The believer is not given to cursing, slandering or obscene and foul speech.
Shall I not tell you about the people of Paradise? Every weak and oppressed one.
How bad is the food of a feast to which the rich are invited and from which the poor are excluded.
Whosoever gives me a guarantee to safeguard what is between his jaws and what is between his legs, I shall guarantee him Jannah.
If you were to rely upon Allah with the reliance He is due, you would be given provision like the birds, They go out hungry in the morning and come back with full bellies in the evening.
Whoever misses Jumuah three times out of negligence, Allah will place a seal over his heart.
A woman is taken as spouse for four reasons, namely her property, her ancestry, her beauty and her religion (her piety). So, get married to the religious one or else you will be a loser.

One who performs Isha prayer in congregation, is as if he has performed Salat for half of the night. And one who performs the Fajr prayer in congregation, is as if he has performed Salat the whole night.

Do not cut off one another, nor desert one another, nor hate one another, nor envy one another. Be you , O worshippers o Allah, brothers. It is not lawful for the Muslim to shun his brother for more than three (days).
Have taqwa (fear) of Allah wherever you may be, and follow up a bad deed with a good deed which will wipe it out, and behave well towards the people.
Shall I not tell about the people of the Hellfire? Every one who is harsh, haughty, disdainful and arrogant.

The first matter that the slave will be brought to account for on the Day of Judgment is the prayer. If it is sound, then the rest of his deeds will be sound. And if it is bad, then the rest of his deeds will be bad.
Or were they created by nothing, or are they their own creators?
arabic: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ

content: Atij që falet natën gjatë Ramazanit, duke besuar dhe llogaritur në shpërblimin e Allahut, i falen mëkatet e së kaluarës.
Nuk ka besuar asnjëri prej jush, derisa tek ai të jem më i dashur sesa prindi e fëmija i tij, si dhe krejt njerëzimi.
Disa prej shenjave të Kiametit janë: pakësimi i diturisë, rrënjosja e i injorancës, konsumimi i alkoolit dhe përhapja e zinasë.
Mos gënjeni për mua, se ai që gënjen për mua, do të hyjë në Zjarr.
Lehtësoni e mos vështirësoni, përgëzoni e mos trembni.
Ai që thotë për mua atë që nuk kam thënë, le të përgatitet për ulësen e tij në Zjarr.

Një njeri pa një qen duke ngrënë (lëpirë) dhé nga etja. Kështu, e mori këpucën e vet, e mbushi me ujë dhe ia shoi etjen qenit. Allahu i ishte mirënjohës për veprën, prandaj e futi në Xhenet.

Allahu nuk ka nevojë që të lërë ushqimin dhe pijen ai që nuk i lë fjalët dhe punët e këqija (gjatë agjërimit).
Hani syfyr, sepse në syfyr ka begati.
Nëse ha e pi nga harresa, le ta plotësojë agjërimin, se Allahu e ka ushqyer dhe i ka dhënë të pijë.
Kushdo që u bën kurthe banorëve të Medinës, do të shkrihet ashtu siç shkrihet kripa në ujë.
Pjesa mes shtëpisë dhe minberit tim është një prej kopshteve të Xhenetit, ndërsa minberi im është mbi Hauzin tim.
Varfëria e ka një të mirë, nuk sjell në derë miq interesi.
Zilia është një sëmundje shumë e madhe e zemrës, kurse sëmundjet e zemrës nuk mund të shërohen ndryshe përpos me dije dhe vepër.
Asnjë superfuqi nuk mund t'i shkelë muslimanët derisa muslimanët nuk e shkelin udhërin e Zotit të Gjithfuqishëm.
Nuk ka kapital më të mirë për një djalë të ri sesa një shok i cili e drejton nga Allahu.
Problemet e rinisë së sotme se ose merren me të kaluarën, ose merren me të ardhmen, ose merren me të huajën.
Prej adhurimeve është edhe mërzia që s'kemundësi për të bërë një vepër të mire.
Nëse nuk ndien mërzi pasi të bësh gjynahun, dije se zemra jote edhe pse është gjallë klinikisht, ajo llogaritet e vdekur fetarisht.
Kush vëren se gjoksi i tij nuk zgjerohet dhe nuk përjeton ëmbëlsinë e Imanit dhe dritën e udhëzimit, le të tëb sa më shumë teube (pendim) dhe instigar (kërkim falje).
Nuk do mund të gjesh njeri me mendje të rehatshme, zemërgjerë dhe të qetë sikurse besimtari, edhe nëse është i varfër.
Ajo që është shkruar për ty nuk i shkon askujt, andaj qetësohu dhe mos ki zili ndaj askujt.
Nëse dëshiron të ngjitet shpirti lart, shkëputu nga gjërat që e rëndojnë në toke.
Të metat e trupit na i mbulon petku, kurse të metat e mendjes na i zbulon debati.
Do të t'i kompensojë Allahu një ditë të gjithë ato që ke shpresuar, madje edhe më shumë.
Thesari më i mirë në botë është Kur'ani. Shoqëroje në dynja që të shoqërojë e të ndërmjetësojë në ahiret.
Vlera e njeriut nuk është ajo që posedon por, ajo që u jep të tjerëve pa pritur prej tyre asgjë.
Namazi i sabahut është peshorja e besimtarit.
Qaj në këtë dunja, që të qeshësh në ahiret e mos qesh në kët dunja që të qash përgjithmon në ahiret.
Mjekra përderisa ishte sunet i Pejgamberit ﷺ u neglizhua, e kur u bë modë dhe model i jobesimtarëve garuam në të.

Ai që zgjedh sinqeritetin si mjetin e tij, Allahu si çmim do t'i dhurojë kënaqësinë e Tij.
Ju këshilloj me dy gjëra, të shoqëroheni me dijetarët, dhe të duroni të paditurit.
Nëse ke mundësi të mos zemërohesh për asnjë gjë në këtë dynja, bëje.
Kush studion biografinë e sahabëve do t'i kuptoj mangësit e veta, dhe se sa larg gradës së tyre është.
Kur dikush kyren një gjynah dhe gëzohet, gëzimi i tij është më i keq se kryerja e vetë gjynahut.

Shpëtimi i egozimit është të mos i bindesh atij, ndërsa belaja e tij është ta ndjekësh atë në çdo gjë që të urdhëron.
Nëse do të jesh i lumtur dhe i qetë në shpirt, atëherë ndihmoji nevojtarët, kënaqi shokët dhe miqtë dhe sigurohu në përgatitjen kur të ndahesh nga kjo dynja.
Thjeshtësia më e dobishme është ajo që të largon mendjemadhësinë dhe ta vdes zemërimin për të triumfuar egozimin.

Puno sikur të mos ketë mbi tokë asnjë njeri veç teje, dhe të mos ketë në qiell asgjë veç Krijuesit.
Prijësi i çdo pune është dija, ndërsa prijësi i çdo dije është interesimi dhe këmbëngulja në kërkimin e saj.
Allahu i Lartësuar nuk e çon dëm shpërblimin e dhikrit të gjuhës, edhe nëse zemra është e pavëmendshme, por shpërblim i mangët.
Nëse të thahet syri nga të qajturit prej frikërespektit të Allahut të Madhëruar, atëherë dije ajo thatësirë është nga zemra e ngurtë.
Qejfet e kësaj bote janë si teatri i hijeve, i padituri kufizohet vetëm në atë që i shohin sytë, ndërsa një njeri i mençur, shikon edhe përtej perdeve nga ku luhet loja.
Edhe vdekja do të vdes, që në fund të mbet veç jeta, asnjë rrenë s'do të mbesë, kur të gjykojë veç e vërteta.
Dersi është jetë, dhe jeta është ders.
Mos e shaj shejtanin, veç mos i shko pas.

Dezinfektuesi global është në prag, andaj, le t’i pastrojmë zemrat tona, të mbajmë distancë prej gjynaheve, të hyjmë në karantinë të adhurimit, me shpresë që të kalojmë të pastër në Xhennet e Zotit të botrave.
Dituria dhe adhurimi pa devotshmëri është hipokrizi.
Nëse fillon diçka me 'Bismilah', atëherë Allahu vendos bereqet për atë çështje.
Sa njeriu ka qenë i udhëzuar, për shkak të një shikimi haram i është marrë imani.
Gëzimi me të keqen e vëllaut është mallkim, andaj mos lejo veten të jesh në atë zonë!
Islami është sikurse dielli për tokën, nuk mungon asnjëherë; nëse perëndon në një vend, lind në tjetrin.
Mos e shih si të vonuar përgjigjien e lutjeve tua, kur ia ke bllokuar rrugën me mëkate.
Kush ka vdekur në Islam dhe Sunnet, ka vdekur në të gjitha mirësitë.
Bëhu tek Allahu ashtu siç dëshiron Ai, dhe Ai do të jetë për ty më shumë nga sa mendon.
Të vepruarit për inati të dikujt është shkatrrim!
Çdo punë e cila nuk të ndihmon ditën kur do të ringjallesh pa rroba, është punë që do bëhesh pishman!
Nuk është prekur robi me dënim më të rëndë sesa me ngurtësim të zemrës dhe distancim prej Allahut.
Nga ilaçet më të dobishme është insistimi në lutje.
The hijrah to Allah includes abandoning what He hates and doing what He loves and accepts.
Wasting time is worse than death, because death separates you from this world whereas wasting time separates you from Allah.
The perfection of Tawheed is found when there remains nothing in the heart except Allaah.
As long as you are performing prayer, you are knocking at the door of Allah, and whoever is knocking at the door of Allah, Allah will open it for him.
A real man is one who fears the death of his heart, not of his body.
If a heart becomes attached to anything other than Allah, Allah makes him dependent on what he is attached to. And he will be betrayed by it.
The heart will rest and feel relief if it is settled with Allah. And it will worry and feel anxious if it is settled with the people.
Sins have many side-effects. One of them is that they steal knowledge from you.
If the heart becomes hardened, the eye becomes dry.
Sins have many side-effects. One of them is that they steal knowledge from you.
Love of Allah is the power of the heart, the sustenance of the heart, the light of the heart.
When Allah tests you it is never to destroy you. When He removes something in your possession it is only in order to empty your hands for an even greater gift.
Whoever desires to purify his heart, then let him prefer Allah to his desires.
This wordly life is like a shadow. If you try to catch it, you will never be able to do so. If you turn your back towards it, it has no choice but to follow you.
Be sincere in your aim and you will find the support of Allaah surrounding you.
A person’s tongue can give you the taste of his heart.
Speech remains as a slave to you, but the moment it leaves your mouth, you become its slave.
Appreciate what you have, and do not think of what you do not have. What you have is from Allah’s Blessing, and what you do not have is from Allah’s wisdom.
Whoever thinks that falsehood overcomes righteousness, they don’t have full trust in Allah!
If you do good in secret, Allah will shower His good on you in public.
What really counts are good endings, not flawed beginnings.

Don't depend too much on anyone in this world because even your own shadow leaves you when you are in darkness.
If I remained silent and you remained silent, then who will teach the ignorant?
Allah will support the just state even if it is led by unbelievers, but Allah will not support the oppressive state even if it is led by believers
A calamity that makes you turn to Allah is better for you then a blessing which makes you forget the remembrance of Allah
Imprisoned is he whose heart is imprisoned from Allah. Captured is he who is captured by his desires.
Avoiding the temptation to sin and being patient upon that, is greater than being patient whilst being afflicted with trials.
The disease that knowledge brings is arrogance, and the disease that worship brings is showing off
Men mixing with women is like fire mixing with wood.
If you could hear the sound of the pens of the angels writing your name among those who remember Allah, you’d die out of joy.
Or were they created by nothing, or are they their own creators?
Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.
Or were they created by nothing, or are they their own creators?
And Allah would not punish them while they seek forgivenes.
Call upon me, I will respond to you.
And He has made me blessed wherever I am.
So remember me, I will remember you.
And verily the hereafter, will be better for thee. Than the present
And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, ‘If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, ‘My punishment is severe.

Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is the straight path.
Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established.
And let there be from you a nation inviting to good, enjoining what is right and forbidding what is wrong, and those will be the successful.
If the sea were ink for the words of my lord, the sea would surely be consumed before the words of my lord are exhausted.
And He found you lost and guided [you].

And whoever puts all his trust in Allah, He will be enough for him.
He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
My mercy embraces all things.
And who despairs from the mercy of his Lord, except those astray?
You prefer the life of this world, while the hereafter is better & more lasting.
Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth.
Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
They are [varying] degrees in the sight of Allah and Allah is Seeing of whatever they do.
And We created you in pairs.

And He is with you wherever you are.
Indeed, Prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing.
And Allah is the best of providers.
Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of Supplication.
Indeed, those who disbelieve it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them they will not believe.
O mankind, worship your Lord, who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous.
And do not mix the truth with falsehood or conceal the truth while you know [it].
But do they not know that Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare?
Do you not know that to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and [that] you have not besides Allah any protector or any helper?
When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
The truth is from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.
So remember Me, I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

Allah has sent down the Book in truth. And indeed, those who differ over the Book are in extreme dissension.

And no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.

Allah loves those who place their trust in Him.

Say, [O Muḥammad], "If you should love Allah, then follow me, [so] Allah will love you and forgive you your sins. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

And whoever desires other than Islam as religion, never will it be accepted from him, and he, in the Hereafter, will be among the losers.
Never will you attain the good [reward] until you spend [in the way of Allah] from that which you love.

O you who have believed, fear Allah as He should be feared and do not die except as Muslims [in submission to Him].
And fear the Fire, which has been prepared for the disbelievers.
And obey Allah and the Messenger that you may obtain mercy.
Who spend [in the cause of Allah] during ease and hardship and who restrain anger and who pardon the people, and Allah loves the doers of good.
and Allah loves the doers of good.
This [Qur’ān] is a clear statement to [all] the people and a guidance and instruction for those conscious of Allah.
And whoever desires the reward of this world, We will give him thereof, and whoever desires the reward of the Hereafter, We will give him thereof. And We will reward the grateful.
And We will reward the grateful.
Allah is your protector, and He is the best of helpers.
And whether you die or are killed, unto Allah you will be gathered.
If Allah should aid you, no one can overcome you, but if He should forsake you, who is there that can aid you after Him?
Indeed, those who purchase disbelief [in exchange] for faith, never will they harm Allah at all, and for them is a painful punishment.
Ti bën durim në vendimin e Zotit tënd, se ti je nën mbikëqyrjen Tonë.
Mos u ndalni, së përmenduri Mua.

Mos jini nga ata të cilët e harruan Zotin e tyre dhe Allahu i harroi ata.
Zoti ynë, mos na i lako zemrat tona pasi na drejtove, na dhuro mëshirën Tënde, sepse vetëm Ti je dhuruesi i madh.
Kushdo që i kthen shpinën këshillës Sime, do të ketë jetë të mjeruar dhe Ne, në Ditën e Kiametit, do ta ringjallim të verbër.
Të keqen ktheje me të mirë.
E me lutjen time ndaj Teje o Zoti im, asnjëherë nuk kam qenë i dëshpëruar.
Mjerë për secilin që ofendon e përqesh (njerëzit).
Ne e kemi krijuar njeriun, dhe e dimë se ç'pëshpërit ai në vete.
Dhe adhuroje Zotin tënd deri sa të vijë ty e vërteta (vdekja).
Sa i përket atij që besoi dhe bëri vepra të mira, atij i takon shpërblimi më i mirë (xhenneti) dhe atij nga ana Jonë do t'i bëjmë lehtësi (në jetë).
Mos u mërzit, se Allahu është vërtetë me ne.
